Classes

.. py:class:: BasePainter

   Bases: :py:obj:`abc.ABC`

   Abstract base class for all pipeline painters.


   .. py:property:: available_formats
      :type: Sequence[str]
      :abstractmethod:

      List of the available formats to render the
      computational graph into.

   .. py:method:: from_pipeline(pipeline)
      :abstractmethod:

      Method for drawing the `pipeline` and saving the
      result into internal representation.


   .. py:method:: from_executor(executor)
      :abstractmethod:

      Method for drawing the pipeline connected with the `executor`
      and saving the result into internal representation. The drawn
      graph should represent executor's behaviour.


   .. py:method:: render(output_filename, format = None)
      :abstractmethod:

      Method for saving drawn computational graph.

      :param output_filename: Path (containing the filename) where the output graphics file will be saved.
      :param format: Format of the output file. If `None`, then the `output_filename` determines the format.
